website_summaries.verdict: This versatile table lamp is great for side tables or by your bed, giving you a pleasant, soft light.
pros: Can produce warm white light plus a range of hues from the 256 RGB color spectrum
The 360-degree base lets you adjust color and brightness via touch
cons: Controls take a bit of getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Too bright and stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a nice gentle night light. WAY too bright and NOT easy to control the dimming. Also, it stopped working after 2 months of owning it - no way to check if it's the bulb because it doesn't come apart. Unfortunately the window of opportunity to return (1 month) has already passed or I would be sending it back. UPDATE: the company honored my request for a replacement and the new one worked much better - even bought another one for my niece who loves it. Thanks Aukey!
customer_reviews.author: Murfens

customer_reviews.title: Cannot pick color...
customer_reviews.text: So this looked like a great idea! Except you can’t turn it off without going to full brightness first (great when you’re going to bed, get that big bright light in your face). Also, you can’t pick the colors... they just rotate around. Green or blue are nice to set the mood, until it turns red
customer_reviews.author: JMLost

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE, lamp shorts out constantly and is a hazard!
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't matter what the lamp looks like or how it looks when it frequently shorts out and trips the 20 amp breakers in the house. We purchased this lamp for our 13 year old and he did like the lamp but we couldn't figure out why the breakers were constantly going off and shutting down our computers and appliances. Our house was built in 2012 and has modern wiring so this is not a case of poor electrical wiring in the house... this is a case of a poor quality, and likely hazardous lamp. Obviously, I took the lamp from my son and will have to replace it with a safer model. NOT RECOMMENDED, BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Aquarius

customer_reviews.title: way too bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a night light for my 4 year old son, nice quality (but VERY sensitive touch pad) but the light is WAY too bright even in the lowest setting. You can read a book to it even when it is halfway across the room. DEFINITELY do NOT use as a night light. We already have lamps in our room for reading in bed, so now it just illuminates the entire kitchen in late night or early mornings. It works great at that, but not our intended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: scott bruschetti

customer_reviews.title: I love this and plan on getting more
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is what it says it is 3 levels of brightness for the white light and then the color changing mode is nice for the room i use it in its perfect have had it n many videos and even when using it to see its great i will say dont let it fall on hard floor surfaces but mines still works even with a cracked cover i would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: John jones jr

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Versatile Light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the colored lights to set a romantic mood in the bedroom, but it is so much more! The white light is bright enough to get ready for bed, and I'm also using the colored light sequence for relaxing before sleep. Bonus that it's cordless, I've tried it out in different areas of the bedroom. Helpful hint - the base control doesn't always respond if your hands are very dry, so I sometimes breathe on my finger to moisten it, and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Leo C

customer_reviews.title: Colorful light!!
customer_reviews.text: You tap once to change the brightness of the white light and if you want different colors you long tap for 3 seconds until the colors start up. If you like a color you just tap once and it stays at that color. If you want white light again I think you just have to long tap for 3 seconds until it turns off and then tap once for it to turn on. I love this lamp so far. Everything came nicely packaged and all you have to do is plug it in and tap it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: MOODY
customer_reviews.text: As Brick Tamland would say, I love lamp. This lamp is honestly one of my favorite purchases of 2016. I don't know why I like it so much. It it sleek, simple to use, bright, dim, colorful, whatever I want. The touch sensitive base works very well. I love it so much I bought two for my small room and have them both rotating through colors opposite each other. Creates a very cool atmosphere. I would definitely recommend this to a friend, and I have.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my son in college in 09/2018 and the item has stopped working. The light flickers and smells burnt. It was used intermittently and not left on all day. It was a great light but to only work for 5 months is ridiculous. I tried to contact the company but I am now “outside” of my return time frame. In addition I can not get product “help” neither since it’s outside the “allotted” time. If you’re ok with purchasing product to last 5 months then this is the product for you but I have wasted my money and their customer support is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: JeN

customer_reviews.title: They are really great Lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered two for my desk and loved them so much that I purchased another set! I will say that I was a little disappointed with the fact that the larger lamps can't be charged (the smaller ones can be used in a power outage so that's a plus), but they are brighter so its to be expected... Would recommend highly to those on the fence about buying
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with quality & performance
customer_reviews.text: I now keep the charger hooked up to it all the time, rather than charging it up separately every day. We mostly use the colored lights, and without being plugged into the charger, it needs to be charged after about 4 hours. But this way it's a good back-up in case of a power outage. It does work for 2 nights stand-alone, on the low setting. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Boatner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Works absolutely amazing and lights up my room really bright! I like how easy it is to use and how you can stop on a certain color when its on color changing mode and the fact it has no switches and is able to be charged! Definitley Reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas lyczynski

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Highest setting in a dark room is kind of harsh on the eyes. I tried this for a fairly small office space, but it just wasn't for me. There wasn't a good setting to have it bright enough to actually serve a purpose as a lamp, but not hurt my eyes. Maybe if you got multiples on one of the lower settings? The color changing was also a little finicky. Sometimes it would change and sometimes it wouldn't. There also isn't a way to have it set to a certain color whenever you turn it on. It resets to plain white every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible touch controls.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Aukey reached out to me almost immediately after my initial 2 star review to correct the situation. They replaced the light with another that works like a charm. Fantastic customer service and the lamp (now that it works) is great. Light is much cooler temperature than my expectation. Not "warm" white by most standards. Touch controls are incredibly inconsistent- seems like a grounding issue. Sometimes touch controls work great, other times you can touch dozens of times with no reaction whatsoever. I own a number of Aukey products which have all been great, but this is a solid miss.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S. Morganthall

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my night stand by bed, current table lamp requires me to be up in order to switch it off. I can easily reach to this touch lamp and it works as expected. It is not a reading lamp, but for getting ready for bed, it is good enough. The battery life is not long, only last 2-3 nights, so I ended up have it plugged in all time.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Fun Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This chargable lamp is great for our screen porch, as well as outside & inside the house - because you don't need a plug to use it. Doesn't use much table space. The white light high setting is bright enough for reading, sewing or any activity. The medium & low white light settings create a calming atmosphere. The color-changing mode will surprise and delight your friends and family - especially the kids. Makes a wonderful gift too. We now have 4 of these wonderful lamps that we use everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Calamity

customer_reviews.title: One star.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was great at first but now (after about a month) the lamp's color mode will turn on randomly; sometimes when it's on white light mode, and sometimes when it's completely off. I have to unplug the lamp every night so the bright red light doesn't come on randomly in the middle of the night and scare the hell out of my kid. Also, I might have given this product two or three stars despite the fact that it acts like it's possessed however, apparently any review that is less than 4 stars is prohibited, so the dishonest business practice of this seller only merits one star.
customer_reviews.author: Dagny Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Aukey seems to really listen to these reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lamp and was playing with it for a hour or so, lives pretty to expectations. The LED's lowest level can be used as a night light while the medium and highest level definitely can be used for before sleep reading at bed. I was afraid of how some reviews said that the *blue* LED indicator light was bright and bothering some buyers from sleep. However, I found that Aukey changed this to a less eye bothering orange like light and its not as bright now as some reviewers were talking about. I guess Aukey does care about what we say!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Touch Tech - Too Bright & Harsh
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The touch sensor is responsive but not overly sensitive Cons: Even on the first/lowest setting, the light is too bright and harsh to use as a bed-side lamp, and it just gets brighter and harsher with the 2nd and 3rd levels. This is particularly awful for a bed-side lamp because, like with every other touch lamp, you have to go through all three settings to turn this light off - and the third setting is absolutely blinding at 3 AM. If I was able to change the bulb to a lower watt, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-O

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this because I was looking for a little nightstand lamp that was simple and gave us warm lighting..well I don’t know if it was my nightstand or the speaker I had right there which shouldn’t cause interference but..this high pitched frequency sound started emitting from the lamp!! It was so annoying and I did unplug everything else to check if it was maybe something else but nope..it was the lamp. I returned it and now my nightstand area is back to the darkness :/
customer_reviews.author: Pris1388

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, User-Unfriendly Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is possibly the most annoying thing I’ve gotten at Amazon this year. I bought it for the color controls, but it is essentially impossible to get it to stuck on any particular color for a long period. It doesn’t have buttons, so you have to touch it in some mysterious way that isn’t described in the instructions. It’s more or less useless to me because the controls are difficult to impossible to use and I’ve wasted too much time trying to get it set to my needs every night. I’m just keeping it unplugged by the bed stand because it’s so sensitive that anything will cause it to turn out. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wells

customer_reviews.title: So bright.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a house with no overhead lights in the bedrooms, so I finally dusted this lamp off and have wayyy more appreciation for it now; it's VERY bright. This is my first time living with hardwood floors, and the ambience and mood this lamp provides is super cozy, relaxing, and nice looking compared to when I used it in a room with carpet. It's actually bright enough to adequately light up my whole room late at night without any other light sources, but this lamp is so convenient and good looking that I'll probably scatter 3-4 in my room with various colors to see what kind of vibe I can get going on in this room.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and immediately went to set it up in my child's bedroom since her last nightlight went bad. Plugged it in and... nothing. Checked the instructions and it mentioned the light on the base indicates its plugged it. That light doesn't turn on when I plugged it in. Immediately did a return/replace with Amazon. I will change the review once the new one arrives (if it works).
customer_reviews.author: PegLeggedPirate

customer_reviews.title: Cool, versatile "mood" lighting lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp has ended up on the top shelf in the bathroom -- which is perfect. Put it on soft /low white light when you have guests (it's a nice alternative of having guests have to fumble for the light switch), AND it's the perfect soft lighting when you switch it to the changing colored light to take a bath by -- more relaxing than the overhead light -- helps segue you into a relaxing sleep. :)
customer_reviews.author: St Paul MT

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this little lamp! Bought it for the bedroom to have a little ambience. Three modes of brightness with regular warm lighting plus the color wheel. Love that it’s travel friendly too. My hubby also used it as an extra light source when doing a repair on our fridge. Another reviewer mentioned this is a “throw away lamp” meaning when the bulb burns out you can’t just change the bulb and have to buy a whole new lamp. That’s bothersome to the environmentalist in me And I would love to see this lamp with replaceable bulbs But other than that we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised and good value with some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: The product does as advertised and cycling through the different settings is easy. However, the white settings are VERY BRIGHT and much brighter than I anticipated considering it's an 'accent' lamp. I generally let it cycle somewhere between orange and yellow to get a nice peachy glow and 'stop' it there. Also, after a couple months it has suddenly decided to turn itself on in the middle of the night in the rainbow mode. Neighbors must think we run a disco in our living room. Personally, I thought I woke up to some sort of technicolor paranormal event at 2am. It's unplugged when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: "maile_miller"

customer_reviews.title: It was neat when it worked though I would have liked a more precise adjustment option rather than just letting ...
customer_reviews.text: It died after 5 months of occasional use. It was neat when it worked though I would have liked a more precise adjustment option rather than just letting it cycle through colors until it lands on just the right one. Still in working condition it would have been a 4 star product if it would last. About 4 months in it didn't power on anymore one day but disconnecting the power source and reconnecting got it going again. Then at about 5 months it stopped powering on for good. I'm hoping the manufacturer stands by their products but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Williams

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking lamp with a couple drawbacks you should be aware of
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice touch lamp to have on a modern looking home office desk. There are 3 brightness settings, and the color temperature is pleasant. The colored light mode isn't particularly useful. You can't set a color and have it remembered for the next time you turn it on. Not a big deal for me. Probably would want a different light of you wanted a consistent light color without having to cycle through every time you turn it on. Also, know that there is a very slight glow even when the light is turned off. If you like your room to get pitch black, you won't want this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great... Until it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using the lamp while I used it. The touch sensor light was very handy for a bedside lamp. Easy to use in the morning and not blinding. It stopped working for me recently when I attempted to turn it on. I got a small shock and the device LED indicator turned off even though it was plugged into the wall. EDIT: a representative contacted me and everything was sorted out. It was covered under warranty so they sent a new one right away. The company was great to work with, so I'll update my 3 stars to 4. I think the product is great too, maybe I just was unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: Trace Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought a different one, somewhat misleading description.
customer_reviews.text: Only color cycling is available? What a fail. Yes you can stop the color shift on a color you like but this isn't an actual way to find the precise shade you're looking for. Kinda misleading product description in my opinion. Only wanted this for 2 things: soft light, and color light. It doesn't even stay on the color you set when you switch into color cycling. @Aukey - you guys think that color cycling is a feature people want?? I can't imagine anyone wanting to have this thing cycling through random garish colors.... Just make it possible to select the color you want, and then keep that as your default color.
customer_reviews.author: James McNally

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, upon arrival we were able to tap the bottom multiple times to get the multi-colors to come on (but this was completely random if & when they came on) but they would continuously switch colors. It would not stay on one specific color for a period of time. However, now that I’m outside of my Amazon return window, the multi-colors won’t come on at all. It is just an overpriced 3-way boring white light lamp.
customer_reviews.author: BQAL

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Electronics
customer_reviews.text: Received this product March 3, 2017. Today when we tried to turn it on, it went "poof" - the bulb had burned out. WOW! Really? Did not own the product even two months and it's already non functioning. So many low-end electronics products are simply not reliable - are poorly made with cheap parts used. I would advise against purchasing this lamp - it's a POS.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The light kept turning on automatically. Customer service sent us a second one. It was better. Instead of automatically turning on 7-8 times a day, the replacement only does it 3-4 . Most annoying, especially at night. Tossing the second one too. Instructions say the lamps are sensitive to metal. They were on my wood bed table far from any metal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Tymn

customer_reviews.title: This is a good lamp and the Aukey customer service is EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these months ago and it's worked perfectly so I ordered a second a couple weeks ago. The second wouldn't completely shut off and glowed a very soft white unless it was unplugged. I wrote to the company and they immediately sent me a new one that should arrive in a few days. I was so pleasantly surprised by their very prompt attention and reply to my email and so glad they are sending a new one for free. Their response and their excellent product have really impressed me. Thank you Aukey! I recommend their products and their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 24 months. Neat colors. Controls okay not great.
customer_reviews.text: It was useful as a bedside lamp while it lasted. It's warrantied for 24 months but true to luck, it stopped working days after that expired. I contacted the company but they would only offer to let me buy another one at a discount. All the other lamps in my home are still working 5-10 years later. My guess is the bulb or other internal connection. The touch controls work but the colors can only cycle through in one direction. You have to wait for it to reach the color you want then stop it with a long press. Not bad but it would be nice to be able to manually cycle back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Eggroll

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not overly excited or overly underwhelmed with this light, but it does exactly what I want, and that is be a touch light! I prefer cool light vs warm light, and this is more on the warm side, but it's not AS yellow as a tungsten light bulb would be. You can see in the picture the difference between a daylight lightbulb in the ceiling and this light on my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: It's a literal nightlight unless you unplug it every time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was so easy to assemble and is super bright but it's not the one for me. You can never turn it all the way off unless you unplug it. For grownups who don't need a nightlight blaring next to your face, I'd recommend something else. Also, every time you turn it off, it makes you tap through all the ultra-bright settings that make your pupils dilate violently and wakes you up just after you've decided it's time to go to sleep. Cool touch sensor tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: A little too sensitive, and on/off actions could be better
customer_reviews.text: The Positive: I enjoy the look, the colors, and the brightness levels this lamp provides. The cycles of color are fun. The Negative: If on white light, you have to press multiple times to cycle through brightness to turn off the lamp. When on a color or the color cycle, you have to touch the lamp for several seconds for it to turn off. As well, the lamp is extremely sensitive. I have accidentally turned it on when placing my phone or glasses down on the bedside table, which can be annoying. It is definitely a unique and fun lamp, but has drawbacks people should be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It's OK... Colors are not bright enough. Touch base too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I still think this is a decent purchase. I enjoy the setup of colors ahs how to select them. The touch pad base is too sensitive. It's like it will just start up on its own going thru the colors. I won't be near it and it'll just go thru the color scheme... Maybe it's a ghost. I wish the colors were brighter. I don't understand why the standard lamp light has 3 brightness options but the colors have no brightness options. The lack of option for color brightness was the real review breaker for me... :-(
customer_reviews.author: Neal121

customer_reviews.title: Pro: 3 brightness. Rainbow effect. Con: hard to choose specific color from rainbow mode
customer_reviews.text: Pro: 3 light brightness. Rainbow effect is cool. Ability to touch anywhere on the metal. Ability to choose any color during rainbow mode. Cons: Hard to choose a color out of rainbow mode (have to hold for 3 seconds to start rainbow mode, then once it turns the color you want, you have to hold for another 3 seconds. If you miss the color, you have to wait for the cycle to repeat). Unable to use with smart plug- if the power is turned off while light is on, and then turned back on, you have to manually press metal on light to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Very cool item.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, this thing is really cool. It’s compact, efficient and has 3 distinct brightness levels ranging from soft light to bright enough to light a good sized room. Touch controls are responsive and the color cycle mode is a great extra. You can make the light any color you want which is pretty nice. I work mostly from home now and the lighting in my office wasn’t great over by the desk. I got this light to reduce eye strain and brighten things up a bit and it works perfectly. Not to mention, it’s really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Llama

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light except for a single fatal flaw. When this is “off”, it still gives off a significant amount of light. There is a lit button (for no reason, the button isn’t even used as a switch so its location is irrelevant) and there is residual glow in the dome when the lamp is “off”. Unless you have a lot of light in your bedroom anyway, this is like leaving a flashlight on. For an office it could be great. 1 star for not turning off completely, especially when there is really no reason for it.
customer_reviews.author: Xgate

customer_reviews.title: Bright white light, not warm white light
customer_reviews.text: The description states this is a “warm white light” but it is not. Instead it is a bright white light. It does give off a nice lumination, but I was hoping for a “warm” color light in light yellowish tones like the picture shows, not a “white” color light. If you are looking for a “warm” light keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Versatile Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp will blend in nicely in any room you use it in. It is perfect on a nightstand (or small corner shelf) in the bedroom. I love this lamp and the quality is excellent! No room for a night stand - no problem. Place a small corner shelf above the bed and put the Aukey on it. The lamp has a non-skid base so it won't fall on you and it's so easy to adjust for reading, relaxing, watching tv, or as a night light. I bought 2 more, one for my daughter's den and another for my grandchild's bedroom! Actually this lamp will fit anywhere!! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pleiades

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This light exceeded expectations. It's bright enough to fully illuminate a 12x14ft bedroom. I love the color settings and the dimmer settings. I did have to read the directions to figure out how to use all the different settings but once I did that, it was really easy to use. I have a baby on the way and this light is perfect for nighttime feeding. The color settings offer an even less bright option than the white light, which I know I'll appreciate when I'm waking up in the middle of the night for diaper changes and feeding. I will be ordering a second one for the other side of the bed, and a third for the nursery itself.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp for a stylish effect. It not only looks cool but it is cool to the touch, the LEDs area great and the 3 different light levels are perfect for a bedroom. The color changing is great too. The way you change colors is a bit annoying because there's no way to just get to the color you want. You have to wait for the color to display then tap on the lamp to keep that color active. But what can you expect from a lamp at this price level that does all this stuff. It's a great purchase and goes well with the other LED light changing things I have in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: EarthWormKev

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern looking lamp with versatility.
customer_reviews.text: This AUKEY Table Lamp is great as a flexible lamp where a more modern design is desirable. The touch lamp feature works great! I'm waiting for the right time to spring the colored lights on my 3 year old granddaughter.😛 I use it on the lowest white light setting most of the time and as such it serves well as a soft light with which to read. Important point! The LEDs are of the soft variety. This lamp does not put off bright white light at any setting. I am very happy with this lamp and expect to enjoy it for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: hifiman5

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in the extreme. Quite possibly my favorite thing in all the world.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Like a going-to-a-desert-island-with-only-one-thing-allowed-and-this-is-what-you-take-kind-of-thing. I've bought eleven of these through the past year or so (and I'll bet I buy more-- I'm addicted), as gifts for family and people I really love, as well as for myself. I have four Aukeys in my room alone, including one on a shelf (perfect fit and ambiance), one on a dresser in my closet (tap, and I can see!), and two others highlighting paintings in the room. What gets me about these lights is their simple beauty and that you can so very specifically choose your light, the exact color of it, within the finest gradient. As an artist, this is a miracle to me, so you see... Glorious! -C
customer_reviews.author: Rowan Belt

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a Background Lamp
customer_reviews.text: All in all, this is a very good value for a lamp with many options. The only reason that I didn't give it a 5 star rating, is because of the strange sensitivity towards selecting the options. It's sometimes a bit tricky getting the lamp to select the option that you want, through the touch process. I would prefer a different method of operation in that regard. Nevertheless, it makes a good background lighting lamp. I purchased two of them for use in my master bedroom walk-in closet, and for my main bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for kids room, globe too intense
customer_reviews.text: The best feature of this lamp is that it's a touch lamp and that it changes color. Otherwise, the globe of the lamp is very intense to look at. It's almost like a spot light. The light is not very warm and doesn't really diffuse throughout the room. It works best in a room with a normal height to low ceiling. It's handy for a bedside, but I would not use this lamp for ambient lighting to replace ceiling lighting. I still think it's a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Little

customer_reviews.title: Feel like i overpayed?
customer_reviews.text: the light is descent size and lights up a nice part of the room. the base is very sensitive to touch and quickly acts on command. wish the light would've been whiter and you also have to wait to cycle to the color you want to choose a certain color. i dont think theres an option to run through the various colors. overall it is a nice lamp but i think this is more of a 24.99 item??
customer_reviews.author: G Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this lamp. The grandkids want a lamp brighter than a nightlight, but don't need a lamp with a 40 watt bulb. This item fits the bill. I also think it helps that the lamp sits on the nightstand. I did not try the colored lights feature as that is not what I was looking for. The touch feature works perfectly and gives three different levels of brightness. I like this lamp and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside lamp
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch sensitive switch on this light. You can have "white" light or colored light. The white light has three brightness levels and the colored light is turned on by holding your touch for a few seconds. Great brightness overall. I will purchase one for my wife. Only thing is that when I am at the lowest light setting, when I get dressed early in the morning at 5:00am, in order to turn it off, I need to tap through the Medium and then Brightest brightness setting and that is when my wife complains. Without the wife complaints...this is an awesome light!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutera

customer_reviews.title: Attractive light that can be used for studying or relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp!!! My daughter picked this out for her remote school study space at home, and my initial concern was that the white light would not provide enough illumination. I was wrong, at its highest illumination setting, the lamp provided great light for any activity. My daughter loves the colored lights more, of course, and the variation is fun for her. It's a great compact size with a very small footprint and an attractive minimalist design. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great lamp. I've been looking for a touch lamp for a few years now and this one came up on sale a couple of weeks ago. Although I haven't played with the color changing feature much, I like how bright the lamp is on the 3rd setting (or touch, if you will). It does glow in the dark a bit (I need the room needs to be dark, really dark), so I just unplug it before I go to sleep, problem solved. I bought a 2nd one for my daughter (who made that face when I told her about it) and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Bright light at the touch of a finger
customer_reviews.text: I had the touch light that you had to charge almost daily with a USB cord. It stopped working after 2 years and if I forgot to charge it, it would shut off in the middle of me reading,leaving me in the dark. I got this new one which just uses an electric outlet and has 3 levels of bright light, perfect for reading in bed and no remembering to charge. This one is much better and I'm really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Paton

customer_reviews.title: Randomly switched itself on and off
customer_reviews.text: My lamp was great initially, it has many color options and was enough illumination to read by in bed. However it started turning itself on as if it had had a "long touch" (for color) and it would turn on the color change mode in the middle of the night with a red light. This is very alarming if you are sleeping. Furthermore, when I used it for reading (white light) it would switch to red after ~3 minutes like clockwork. My apartment is very humid, so maybe that was somehow transmitting a "long-touch" signal? I'm not sure, but I have replaced it with a non-touch mechanism light.
customer_reviews.author: RCary

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for about 1 year. Came on by itself recently and then had a very strong burning odor
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for about 1 year. Came on by itself recently and then had a very strong burning odor coming from the base. Never considered this thing to be a possible fire hazard. I have another one and I don't leave it unattended/plugged in anymore. The power cord from the failed unit works just fine on the second unit.
customer_reviews.author: John Guidice

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, very cool lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp colors, brightness, touch control, etc all work well. Only issue is the light leakage at the base like others have stated on their reviews. ****UPDATE****10/25/2017 Aukey Customer service contacted me almost immediacy after I posted this review and offered to ship a new lamp free of charge. The new lamp has NO light leak at all. And instead of a blue light has a very soft, dim orange light which is barely visible. It’s really a really nice lamp before and the fix for the light leak makes it perfect for a bed side lamp. I’ll definitely order more Aukey products with customer service like this!
customer_reviews.author: Scottie137

customer_reviews.title: Had to renew my rating...nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: Thought these did not work. I was wrong, turns out it was my outlet that didn’t work. Have since charged them and they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: FERN M.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this uplight because of the height and silver band base which is the same accent as my other livingroom lamps. It's exactly what I expected and makes such a sleek and stylish appearance lighting the corner of the room on my favorite low-rise book case. It taps from low to medium to bright light easily. Pause and hold for colors, though once in color mode it does get a little confusing as to which quick taps and longer pauses do what, especially when trying to turn it off or return to non-color lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Swann

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I almost didn't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to buy this because I'm cheap and want the very best for my money but I definitely got it here! The touch is sensitive and the range of colors is very pleasing! Fluorescent lights bring me down or give me a headache, but this warm tone makes it feel like sunshine inside! When I want a sunset shade I tap the base to stop it on Orange - Yellow and it's so relaxing. It lights up my office space perfectly and is almost too bright in the highest setting! BUY IT MY DUDE.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table side lamp. I would not buy this to light up an entire room, or office, but if you just want something as a night light or something to keep on low when you are relaxing, this is perfect. Part of me does wonder if I should have paid a little more for the wireless smart one they have, but this lamp is really nice. And I like it a lot. The color changing feature is pretty cool as well, really bright and distinct colors rotate. Like I said, overall, great lamp, but definitely not one to use as a main lighting in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. My only gripe: when you touch the lamp to turn it on, it starts at its lowest setting and gets brighter before it turns off. I use it at night on the lowest setting until I am ready to sleep so I don't really like that it I have to cycle through brighter settings before I can turn it off. I would prefer that it started off bright and got dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: M New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love it for our toddlers room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters room, even after reading the reviews that complained about the status light being too bright. I find those complaints to be unfounded, and too picky. While yes the status light is always on, I find that it is not any brighter than other electronic equipment that has a status light. The amber is not as harsh as a blue status light. We love this, and so does our daughter. She likes that she is able to turn it on or off, on her own. I would recommend this light to others, especially those looking for something that can be soft enough for children's rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Auburngrad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a top Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of the best items I've ever purchased on Amazon. With an infant who sleeps in our room, we've been dealing with issues with baby waking up with our old lamps that clicked whenever we turned them off. These nifty little lamps were so helpful in eliminating the scary feeling of waking the baby up with the touch sensor. The three settings of white light are perfect to illuminate our bedroom when we are reading or hanging out. The rotating color feature is everything for keeping baby distracted from staring at other screens in the room. Extremely happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ware

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new little lamp. I needed something small on the bedside table to reach and easily turn on when I get up at night. Turns on with one touch. Brightens with one, two, three touches then off with 4th if that's what you want. It's attractive, compact and I love the brightness. The price was very reasonable. It is a round cylinder about 4" in diameter making it stable. I've never had it tip. About 8" tall. Look at the specs for sure. white light. The bonus is you can turn on alternating colors in soft hues. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer hunterma

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Impressed me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter's room. I was worried it wouldn't be bright enough to read safely, but wow! It is AWESOME! It can go very dim and very bright. I actually like it better than the normal lamp in my own bedroom. If you are comparing this light to another brand just like it, trust me -- this one is the best. I bought another one similar to it... and returned it because it wasn't as good. Also, it comes with a plug and does not use batteries. So, I wouldn't recommend it for kids under 5 that are still exploring outlets and getting in to things.
customer_reviews.author: myrn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and does not cause radio interference!
customer_reviews.text: This is being used as a bedside reading lamp and night light. It is very easy to operate although the instructions are a bit obtuse. Just remember to press and release for dimming, press and hold momentarily for color cycle to start. The greatest thing for me, as a radio amateur, is that there is no interference to HF or VHF radio receivers. For so many years this has been a real problem from touch lamps, and often the problem extends to other apartments or nearby houses.
customer_reviews.author: valve timer

customer_reviews.title: 3 major issues...
customer_reviews.text: I searched for "WIRELESS table lamp" and this popped up, so naturally I assumed it would be wireless. Why else would the cord be removable? Misleading. Would also be much better with a remote - I bought it to place behind my computer monitor, so I have to reach around and pull it out every time I want to turn it on/off. To make it worse, the touch sensitive feature is unpredictable. I don't care if it looks "sleek" without buttons - if it works better with buttons, just use them. (Hey geniuses - if it's dark and I'm trying to turn the lamp on...I CAN'T SEE where the touch panel is!)
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Should've read description closer
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but I've been spoiled with a remote for all RGB ligthing I have. This does not come with a remote which means you will spend time sitting there waiting for your color to show up. Also, I've not figured out if I can change the brightness once I choose the color I want. It's almost like the different colors comes only in one brightness setting. I was going to use this for my gaming set-up as an accent light on the corner but will probably just throw this in the dark hallway at home.
customer_reviews.author: Aila

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bedside table lamp. I used to have a $10 Target lamp on my night stand and although it was adjustable to position the bulb wherever I wanted, the exposed bulb was still too bright even with a super dim smart bulb. I got this lamp in the mail today and it's everything I was looking for and more! It illuminates the room niceley without being overpowering and it sets the mood for relaxation. I also love the many different color options the bulb has. Great buy! I will definitely be purchasing some more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little thing
customer_reviews.text: 1. Quality control is good 2. No assembly, plug and play 3. Tap once to turn on, tap more to increase or decrease brightness, long press to enter color rotation 4. Perfect for my hone video editing workspace
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: The lowest dim setting isn't dim enough.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the light overall is huge for a nightstand. It is also sometimes difficult to turn on and off of you have other items sitting next to it as you can only do so by touching the metal base. **Update 03/ 22/ 2020** Although I wasn't completely satisfied with the light, the seller contacted me and did all possible to make it right. I was offered another light and am much more satisfied. Thank you for reaching out to me and making me a satisfied shopper! Excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp with a little room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp at work for a few days now. I like the color features, the touch base, the clean and simple design--it sort of blends in nicely and doesn't distract the ambiance but makes it nice and warm (or cool, or however you like it). I have two suggestions for improvement: 1. I wish it remembered what color mode I was on the last time the lamp was on. Each day I have to cycle through the colors to find the one I like and set it up again. 2. Like another reviewer mentioned, the bulb can't be swapped out, making this a disposable lamp.
customer_reviews.author: C. Furr

customer_reviews.title: Funky controls! If you figure them out, please let me know!
customer_reviews.text: So,, I've had two of these for about a month, reviewed the instructions a several times, and still can't figure the on/off/brightness/color setting functions. I tap and tap and hold tap the base but the results are totally random most of the time. I usually have to manually flip the on/off switch at the bottom and start from scratch each time to try to get the lighting I want. Pretty to look at (when you finally have it set to what you want) but nobody home otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Peartree

customer_reviews.title: Touch Commands are a little bit complicated
customer_reviews.text: The touch commands are a little bit complicated, they definitely do take time to get used to. I definitely would read the instructions while opening this and using it, it's not something you can just open and use out the bat. Other than that the touch controls function flawlessly and they respond on demands without failure. It loses 1 star because of how difficult it is to cycle colors and knowing when you've successfully cycled the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Iyiahn

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and not that adjustable
customer_reviews.text: **Edit 07/10/19** The vendor contacted me and literally jumped through all the hoops to make the situation right. I may not have liked the light, but their customer service is on a whole new level. *Original Review* This lamp is too bright to look at directly even on the dimmest setting. The color modes do not dim at all, rendering them useless. The lamp light is not warm, it is closer to bright white, which is horrid to try to relax around. The light touch area is incredibly sensitive so you cannot have it near anything metallic. Overall an uncomfortable eyesore and thoroughly not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Perry

customer_reviews.title: Quite bright but great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Hubby bought it to replace our last touch lamp that broke. This one is a bit brighter than expected but is great for using for the middle of the night feeds of a newborn and entertains the toddler with the different colors. Simple and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Could be a couple of bucks cheaper, but still a cute number
customer_reviews.text: "Exactly what I needed" -- which although true doesn't tell you a thing, does it? Okay: It's compact, simple, unobtrusive on your nightstand, has three brightness levels two of which you can read by (one is pretty bright) and if you have a little kid, or if you just like looking at colored lights, the rotating colors are fun; a few minutes of the red may help you transition to sleep after reading by that bright light. Taps on, taps off, etc.; directions are simple.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: A solution for 2 use cases
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 lamp for my office and liked it so much I ended up buying a 2nd one for my bedroom! The 1st was purchased 3 months ago. I have it set behind my monitor. It provides just enough subtle lighting that I can game and still see what I'm doing. The 3 variable lighting intensity helps out a lot. The 2nd lamp is actually so we can have a red light in our bedroom. We have a newborn baby. Red light doesn't affect your eyes like other lighting. In both cases. This lamp has been exactly what we needed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MarkChass

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but- UPDATE: Company sent me a better one!
customer_reviews.text: Annoying to turn off. Sometimes the touch is not as sensitive as it should and u sit there tapping for a while. Update: after submitting my review, the company contacted me stating they were sorry i wasn't satisfied with the product. They sent me a different, but similar lamp with actual buttons...i just got it today and so far i love it! although my review for this particular lamp is not great, i will say that the company made it right and that stands for something! they stand by their products 100% and truly care about customer satisfaction! i would buy and Aukey product again just knowing how serious they are about making sure the customer comes first...
customer_reviews.author: ar1234

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Ordered 2 and they are broken within 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, and when they worked they worked well. The first one broke within the first month of very limited use. The second one just broke 4 months after purchase. Very disappointed. February Update: We received an email from the supplier stating that they would replace these broken lamps with new ones. We have yet to receive them or hear from them again. We now went from very disappointed to extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to purchase and thought about it for a few days. But I'm so glad I did! I love the three different levels of brightness. I can be focused during the day and start to dim it as I want to relax and unwind before bed. I love the different colors it rotates through and I've read that the red hue is good for people with insomnia. It's nice to have a light but not be overpowered or really wake up when I'm trying to prepare to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: S.Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Was good, but it ended a bit scary
customer_reviews.text: Had this lamp for 2-3 years, didn't use it very often, maybe once a month or so for a couple hours at a time. About 2 weeks ago, I turned it on, and was keep doing whatever I was doing around my apartment on a Saturday afternoon. Several minutes later, I started smelling burning smell, like burning electric stuff/wires. I started freaking out, and looking around apartment. Finally I found out that it was this light - there was no smoke, but the light was very weird and it wasn't changing like it was before. And it smelled bad, like it was burning. I promptly disconnected it it and threw away in a trash can. That's the story I got
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry A Kirilov

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months..
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product!! I wanted to buy two more, one for my husbands night stand table and one for my sons room. Not so much anymore.... Ive had it since september (4 months) and it randomly stopped working. The light comes on, the light that stays on when its plugged in but the actual light wont turn on. I really liked this light so I am very disappointed and it says I cant return or replace it since ive had it for over 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: alexa broderick

customer_reviews.title: Item lasted six months - seller won’t honor guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for six months and rarely used it. About a month ago, most of the functions stopped working. The light turns on and off but can only be red. No white, no rainbow. I reached out to the company through their website. They allegedly offer a one year guarantee on their products. However, even though I reached out to them several weeks ago, I have not heard from them and presume they will not follow through on their warranty. I would not purchase this item or any other item from this seller/manufacturer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. one for each kid. they both love the lamp. so, mission accomplished. they love the three white brightnesses. and like the rotating colors, with the option to pause on the color they like. I wish there was an easy option to get to the color you like more quickly.....vs having to go thru the whole rotation....then having to go thru it again, if you didn't pause at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for my room and it works perfectly! Great for the price, bright, and modern. Love the touch-activated feature and the different color modes!! It took me a day or two to understand how to get the right colors I wanted and how to turn it off but it's actually not that hard. I would recommend this item to someone who needs a small little light for a room or space like I did because its a great buy for such a cheap price. Other comments mentioned the orange light but its not actually that bright and really shouldn't bother you at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find the adapter! It was in the box! the company is responsive thanks for that btw Very relaxing, just might want to label adapter box so its easier to find . it kind of blends in with packaging Previous review: .......Other reviewers no adapter!
customer_reviews.author: MegaMaper

customer_reviews.title: Buzzfeed is not paying me to say this LOL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE clicking on the Amazon gift lists that pop up in Facebook. I think this was on Buzzfeed. I LOVE it! It's in my son's room next to his bed mainly for reading at night. I love the minimal design... complete form meets function. Quality of materials is excellent. I thought it was going to look light and flimsy but, it does not. It's solid and clean. The highest bright setting lights us his small room. I could see several of these used as a floor accent lights as interior design accents.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best table lamp
customer_reviews.text: the best is that is chargeable, you can carry it everywhere. The only issue was that I didn't master the change of light very well but after reading the instructions carefully I got it. The sensitivity of the sensor is very high, not only if you touch it with your hands it will work, but if anything touches it. the brightness is perfect, the different levels are perfect for any use and the best part is that it does not bother your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: NatashaAl

customer_reviews.title: 3 brightness levels.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a soft light for the nightstand to use in the middle of the night. Easy to assemble. Easy to use. Has 3 brightness levels to it. The first is a soft nightlight, then brightens to a full lamp brightness. Really like that it’s a touch, so anywhere on the base and it turns on. No fumbling around for a switch or a click button. It’s small, so doesn’t take up much space on the nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Still figuring it out
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to figure out how to get and stay at the color and illumination I want. Also, how do you turn the light completely off? It seems to stay in this "night light" level when I turn it off. I've just been unplugging it at night, because I don't want ANY light when sleeping. All of this may be user error, so I'm not faulting the lamp entirely, but it shouldn't be this hard to figure out either.
customer_reviews.author: Charise Munlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've become a fan of AUKEY's products; they have a lot of neat tech stuff for reasonable prices without sacrificing quality, and this lamp is no exception. It has a sleek design, so it looks good sitting on the table during the day as well as lit up at night. I love that it has three brightness settings and on the brightest one, it illuminates the entire room. I love the color-changing feature as well, I only wish that when you switched to color it remained in the same brightness mode you chose before. It's very simple to use and works great. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Item is junk. Touch sensitivity is impossible to use. To get it to turn on is easy. That’s it. The colored lights are so difficult to access. When you do they cycle or turn off. Feels cheap. Which obviously it is. The company promised me a refund and an exchange. They said pick a light. I picked a different one and didn’t need a refund. They sent me the same light I don’t want to give a second chance to. I even told them don’t send it to me. They did none the less. No refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: For When You Want Easy On, Easy Off
customer_reviews.text: This may sound odd, but I bought this for the garage. I have an old car and the battery doesn't recharge like it shoul. So I bought a battery -minder that keeps it charged. There is a cable attached to the car battery that sticks out through the grill slightly. The battery minder sits on a shelf and has a connecting cord. It's dark back there. So I just tap the AUKEY Table Lamp and I can see the connections. And tap off after. SO EASY...
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement because I broke the one I had bought my son a few years ago. This lamp, even though it looks nicer, turns on and off and changes the brightness by itself. Useless to us now. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: momd

customer_reviews.title: Touch controls are difficult
customer_reviews.text: The product I received doesn't work as it is intended to. I have to touch it a couple of times or maneuver different ways of holding the lamp and touch it in different areas until it changes settings, it's frustrating because it's supposed to change immediately and effortlessly as I touch the area. Also when charging, the light indicating that it is charging tends to go on and off at the slightest movement. Seems defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mellow beige is awesome in the evening
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the mellow beige setting. It doesn't disappoint. Mellow, just perfect. One in the bathroom (always on, day and night, a nice warm glow). one in the kitchen, same business I wish these were a little less bright, honestly Well, for the kitchen Now I notice they make one with fewer lumens. I'm buying that next. Can't go wrong, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Perry, the pretty good reviewer

product_meta.title: AUKEY Table Lamp Touch Sensor Bedside Lamp Color Changing RGB & Dimmable Warm White Light Night Light for or Bedrooms, Living Rooms and Office【2020 Updated Version】
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:LargeColorful Display 
Set the mood for any occasion. Delight family & friends with a dazzling RGB color display– red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet, and everything in between. Or pick and pause on your perfect color.

Convenient Touch Control
Touch the lamp base to power on/off, switch light modes, adjust brightness, or change color.

Eye-Safe and Eco-Friendly
Comfortable, rich, warm light on every setting. No eye-harming glare. Energy-efficient LED technology saves you money and minimizes environmental impacts. Enjoy bright and colorful mood lighting that's eye-safe and energy-efficient.

24-Month Warranty
All AUKEY products are backed by our 45-Day Money Back Guarantee and 24-Month Product Replacement Warranty. 

Specifications 
Model: LT-T6
Luminous Flux: 450 lumen (Max)
Color Temperature: 2900–3100K
Color Rendering Index: ≥80Ra
Input Voltage: AC 100–240V
Power Consumption: 6W Max (white light), 3W (RGB light) 
Number of LED: 15 (white light), 9 (RGB light)
feature_bullets: Upgraded Lamp: A new version of the classic LT-T6 with an enhanced, modern design and even smoother touch control

Versatile Lighting: A touch-activated table lamp that’s great for relaxing background illumination and reading. Suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, and hallways, as well as relaxed modern offices. Choose between warm white light and a rich blend of vibrant colors

360° Touch Control Base: The upgraded touch panel is more responsive and even operates smoothly on metal surfaces. It provides full control to easily power on/off and switch light modes, brightness, or color
Colorful Display: Auto-cycle an extensive selection of colors from the red-green-blue color spectrum or pick and pause on your favorite
Package Contents: AUKEY LT-T6 Touch Control LED Lamp, AC Adapter, User Manual, 45-Day Money Back Guarantee and 24-Month Warranty Card

specifications.Included Components: AUKEY LT-T6 Touch Control LED Lamp, AC Adapter, User Manual, 24-Month Warranty Card
specifications.Special Features: Comfortable, rich, warm light on every setting, Auto-cycle an extensive selection of colors, Eye protecting, Dimmable three brightness levels of warm white light – soft, moderate, and bright, Touch-activated table lamp, 360° Touch Control Base, Mood-Enhancing Color
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,400 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
